MVP Pattern

This section covers the classes used in the GUI for the USC-DR-RAWCOOKED project.

Model Class

The Model class serves as the core component of the USC-DR-RAWCOOKED project. It provides functionalities for managing configurations, handling transcoding tasks, and interacting with system resources.

class model.model.Model(project_root)

The Model class provides functionality for managing configurations, handling CPU cores, managing license configurations, and executing backend scripts. It is designed to facilitate the setup, monitoring, and termination of processes within a project.

Parameters:

project_root (Path) – The root directory of the project.

Members:

Undoc-members:

Show-inheritance:
